steps.title: Sketch an oblong shape, with the one end pointing down to the direction of the rainfall.
steps.content: Sketch an oblong shape, with the one end pointing down to the direction of the rainfall.

steps.title: Sketch the pointed tail of the raindrop pointing to the opposite end of the oblong.
steps.content: Sketch the pointed tail of the raindrop pointing to the opposite end of the oblong.

steps.title: Draw an outline over the shape of the raindrop and erase the sketch marks.
steps.content: Draw an outline over the shape of the raindrop and erase the sketch marks.

steps.title: Fill and paint over the shape with white.
steps.content: Fill and paint over the shape with white.

steps.title: Paint a light blue gradient over the shape as shown in the image.
steps.content: Paint a light blue gradient over the shape as shown in the image.

steps.title: Paint a darker shade of blue over the shape as shown in the image.
steps.content: Paint a darker shade of blue over the shape as shown in the image.

steps.title: Add a white highlight on the raindrop to complete a 3-dimensional effect.
steps.content: Add a white highlight on the raindrop to complete a 3-dimensional effect.

steps.title: Repeat the entire process to draw other raindrops as well.
steps.content: Repeat the entire process to draw other raindrops as well.

steps.title: Sketch irregularly shaped oblongs or distorted circles.
steps.content: Sketch irregularly shaped oblongs or distorted circles.

steps.title: Draw an outline over the shape of the droplets and erase the sketch marks.
steps.content: Draw an outline over the shape of the droplets and erase the sketch marks.

steps.title: Fill and paint over the shape with white.
steps.content: Fill and paint over the shape with white.

steps.title: Paint a light blue gradient over the shape as shown in the image.
steps.content: Paint a light blue gradient over the shape as shown in the image.

steps.title: Paint a darker shade of blue over the shape as shown in the image.
steps.content: Paint a darker shade of blue over the shape as shown in the image.

steps.title: Add a white highlight on the raindrop to complete a 3-dimensional effect.
steps.content: Add a white highlight on the raindrop to complete a 3-dimensional effect.

steps.title: Add the color of the background surface to complete the drawing.
